minicp.engine.core

Class AbstractConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • minicp.engine.core.AbstractConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constraint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Absolute, AllDifferentBinary, AllDifferentDC, AllDifferentFWC, Circuit, ConstraintClosure, Cumulative, CumulativeDecomposition, Disjunctive, Element1D, Element1DDomainConsistent, Element1DVar, Element2D, Equal, IsEqual, IsLessOrEqual, IsLessOrEqualVar, IsOr, LessOrEqual, Maximum, NegTableCT, NotEqual, Or, Sum, TableCT, TableDecomp

    public abstract class AbstractConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint
    Abstract class the most of the constraints should extend.

      • setScheduled

        public void setScheduled(boolean scheduled)
        Description copied from interface: Constraint
        Set the status of the constraint as scheduled to be propagated by the fix-point. This method Called by the solver when the constraint is enqueued in the propagation queue and is not intended to be called by the user.
        Specified by:
        setScheduled in interface Constraint
        Parameters:
        scheduled - a value that is true when the constraint is enqueued in the propagation queue, false when dequeued
        See Also:
        Solver.fixPoint()

      • isScheduled

        public boolean isScheduled()
        Description copied from interface: Constraint
        Returns the schedule status in the fix-point.
        Specified by:
        isScheduled in interface Constraint
        Returns:
        the last Constraint.setScheduled(boolean) given to setScheduled

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Description copied from interface: Constraint
        Activates or deactivates the constraint such that it is not scheduled any more.

        Typically called by the Constraint to let the solver know it should not be scheduled any more when it is subsumed.

        By default the constraint is active.

        Specified by:
        setActive in interface Constraint
        Parameters:
        active - the status to be set, this state is reversible and unset on state restoration StateManager.restoreState()

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Description copied from interface: Constraint
        Returns the active status of the constraint.
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface Constraint
        Returns:
        the last setValue passed to {Constraint.setActive(boolean) in this state frame StateManager.restoreState().
